algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array and compute the bitwise OR of adjacent elements.
problem_summary_simple: Compute the bitwise OR for every pair of adjacent numbers in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Generates a new array where each element is the bitwise OR of adjacent elements from the input array.
key_insights: The problem can be solved efficiently using a list comprehension.
The output array will always be one element shorter than the input array.
